name: 1Dagskoopjes iBOOD hunt nightmode
description:
Dark, night mode theme for 1Dagskoopjes. Only for during the iBOOD hunt.

-Uncluttered the interface
-Black/dark theme
-Full width deals
-Wider chat/history

Special thanks to Erik <3
